page.title: 19Fox Hollies Park in A. Green
page.content:
This park is a large resting and playing area.
GRASS Most of the park is made up of grass. People play games on the grass such as Football, Cricket, Netball and others. Some people picnic in the park.
TREES There is a wide expanse of trees going through the park. These are mainly sycamore but there are also oaks, birch, pine and chestnuts. Around the edges of the park there are poplar trees making a wind break.
PLAY AREA This attracts most children. They spend hours on the slides,swings and other play apparatus.
B.M.X. There is a very popular B.M.X. track which a lot of the boys use.
